ðŸ“– Summary: The Bouncy Castle Crypto Package is a Java library providing a wide range of cryptographic algorithms. It offers a lightweight API suitable for various environments and conforms to the JCE framework. The library supports building and testing with modern JDKs and provides signed Maven artifacts for secure dependency management.
